name: Little Bro. Simulator Episode 1: The Old Man Behind the Couch
name_original: Little Bro. Simulator Episode 1: The Old Man Behind the Couch
description:
BASED ON A TRUE STORY

You're just a little brother, trying to play video games with your Big Bro, but life is tough. You're going to have to survive the night in order to play!

Features:

  • Low fidelity graphics
  • Low-Poly style
  • Custom sound design

-Developer's note:

I challenged myself to create a horror game in just 1 week, I got creative with a few new mechanics and just had fun!

Enjoy! 

-VeryEpicc
